name: Star-Nosed Diopsid
movement: 30 ft. walking, 15 ft. burrowing, 30 ft. flying
description: The Star-Nosed Diopsid is a large aberration characterized by its star-like nose and unnatural appearance, often invoking fear in those who encounter it. It possesses a resilient physique and its body is designed for both agility and strength.
memorable: This creature has the horrifying ability to transform humanoids into new diopsids, creating a cycle of terror and domination.
goals: Typically seeks to control and corrupt humanoids, expanding its influence through transformation and manipulation.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other aberrations or as a terrifying master of envenomed thralls.
environment: Often found in dark, secluded areas with a focus on arcane influences, such as ancient ruins or underground lairs.
strengths: Strong physical stats enable it to deal significant damage, and its Mutagenic Venom can incapacitate and dominate opponents.
weaknesses: Susceptible to magical attacks, and its abilities rely heavily on proximity to envenomed creatures.
attacks: Utilizes a fearsome stinger for piercing damage and powerful tentacles for bludgeoning damage and grappling.
most_powerful_ability: Mutagenic Venom, which can reduce maximum hit points of a victim and eventually transform them into a diopsid.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect vibrations in its surroundings.
skills: Has a passive perception of 17, showcasing its keen awareness and ability to detect threats.
additional_information: Can see through the senses of envenomed humanoids within 300 feet.
Can telepathically suggest actions to envenomed victims, manipulating their decisions.
Resistant to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Has high endurance and resilience in combat due to strong Constitution.
Can incapacitate opponents while simultaneously controlling them through its envenoming ability.
test_queries: aberration with magical venom and mind control
creature that uses poison to dominate foes
monster with lethal stinger and grappling tentacles
horror that turns victims into new creatures
